page.title: 08Hell's Angels
page.content: Hell's Angels are a group of young men who dress in leather jackets, ride motor bikes and hang chains around their necks. This particular group of Hell's Angels call themselves the Havant City Rockers. We found this out for they have been writing this all over the trees surrounding Racton Tower, we found this when we visited Racton Tower for the Domesday Project. The Hell's Angels hold their meetings in Racton Tower and sit around a fire. They burn their best possessions. Ordinary people think that some Hell's Angels are disgusting, some people are frightened of them.
